system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision frame. GTK+ implementation" legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xmlEV_FRAME_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_frame_i.xmlEV_FRAME_I undefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_propagate_foreground_colorpropagate_foreground_color, ../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_propagate_background_colorpropagate_background_color redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xmlEV_CELL_IMP undefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_needs_event_boxneeds_event_box, ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_makemake end
../implementation_gtk/ev_fontable_imp.xmlEV_FONTABLE_IMP redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_makemake end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_needs_event_box../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_needs_event_boxneeds_event_box: FalseBOOLEAN -- Does a_widget need an event box? do Result := True end
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Create frame. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Initialize Current. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_set_c_objectset_c_object ({../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_frame_newgtk_frame_new (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_nullnull)) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_frame_set_labelgtk_frame_set_label (../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_container_widgetcontainer_widget, ../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_nullnull) ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_set_styleset_style (../interface/ev_frame_constants.xml#f_ev_frame_etched_inEv_frame_etched_in) ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_align_text_leftalign_text_left ../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xml#f_makePrecursor {../implementation_gtk/ev_cell_imp.xmlEV_CELL_IMP} end
feature -- Access
f_style../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_stylestyle: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Visual appearance. See: EV_FRAME_CONSTANTS. local gtk_style: FalseINTEGER_32 do gtk_style := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_frame_struct_shadow_typegtk_frame_struct_shadow_type (../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_container_widgetcontainer_widget) if gtk_style = {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_shadow_in_enumgtk_shadow_in_enum then Result := ../interface/ev_frame_constants.xml#f_ev_frame_loweredEv_frame_lowered elseif gtk_style = {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_shadow_out_enumgtk_shadow_out_enum then Result := ../interface/ev_frame_constants.xml#f_ev_frame_raisedEv_frame_raised elseif gtk_style = {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_shadow_etched_in_enumgtk_shadow_etched_in_enum then Result := ../interface/ev_frame_constants.xml#f_ev_frame_etched_inEv_frame_etched_in elseif gtk_style = {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_shadow_etched_out_enumgtk_shadow_etched_out_enum then Result := ../interface/ev_frame_constants.xml#f_ev_frame_etched_outEv_frame_etched_out else check valid_value: False end end end
feature -- Element change
f_set_style../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_set_styleset_style (a_style: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign a_style to ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_stylestyle. local gtk_style: FalseINTEGER_32 do inspect a_style when ../interface/ev_frame_constants.xml#f_ev_frame_loweredEv_frame_lowered then gtk_style := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_shadow_in_enumgtk_shadow_in_enum when ../interface/ev_frame_constants.xml#f_ev_frame_raisedEv_frame_raised then gtk_style := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_shadow_out_enumgtk_shadow_out_enum when ../interface/ev_frame_constants.xml#f_ev_frame_etched_inEv_frame_etched_in then gtk_style := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_shadow_etched_in_enumgtk_shadow_etched_in_enum when ../interface/ev_frame_constants.xml#f_ev_frame_etched_outEv_frame_etched_out then gtk_style := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_shadow_etched_out_enumgtk_shadow_etched_out_enum else check valid_value: False end end {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_frame_set_shadow_typegtk_frame_set_shadow_type (../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_container_widgetcontainer_widget, gtk_style) end
feature -- Status setting
f_align_text_left../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_align_text_leftalign_text_left -- Display ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_texttext left aligned. do {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_frame_set_label_aligngtk_frame_set_label_align (../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_container_widgetcontainer_widget, {FalseREAL_32} 0.0, {FalseREAL_32} 0.5) ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_internal_alignment_codeinternal_alignment_code := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_justify_left_enumgtk_justify_left_enum end
f_align_text_right../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_align_text_rightalign_text_right -- Display ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_texttext right aligned. do {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_frame_set_label_aligngtk_frame_set_label_align (../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_container_widgetcontainer_widget, {FalseREAL_32} 1.0, {FalseREAL_32} 0.5) ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_internal_alignment_codeinternal_alignment_code := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_justify_right_enumgtk_justify_right_enum end
f_align_text_center../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_align_text_centeralign_text_center -- Display ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_texttext centered. do {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_frame_set_label_aligngtk_frame_set_label_align (../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_container_widgetcontainer_widget, {FalseREAL_32} 0.5, {FalseREAL_32} 0.5) ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_internal_alignment_codeinternal_alignment_code := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_justify_center_enumgtk_justify_center_enum end
feature -- Access
f_text_alignment../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_text_alignmenttext_alignment: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Alignment of the text in the label. do if ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_internal_alignment_codeinternal_alignment_code = {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_justify_center_enumgtk_justify_center_enum then Result := {../interface/ev_text_alignment_constants.xmlEV_TEXT_ALIGNMENT_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_text_alignment_constants.xml#f_ev_text_alignment_centerev_text_alignment_center elseif ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_internal_alignment_codeinternal_alignment_code = {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_justify_left_enumgtk_justify_left_enum then Result := {../interface/ev_text_alignment_constants.xmlEV_TEXT_ALIGNMENT_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_text_alignment_constants.xml#f_ev_text_alignment_leftev_text_alignment_left elseif ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_internal_alignment_codeinternal_alignment_code = {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_justify_right_enumgtk_justify_right_enum then Result := {../interface/ev_text_alignment_constants.xmlEV_TEXT_ALIGNMENT_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_text_alignment_constants.xml#f_ev_text_alignment_rightev_text_alignment_right else check alignment_code_not_set: False end end end
f_text../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_texttext: FalseSTRING_32 -- Text of the frame do if attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_internal_textinternal_text as l_internal_text then Result := l_internal_text.Falsetwin else create Result.Falsemake_empty ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_internal_textinternal_text := Result end end
feature -- Element change
f_set_text../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_set_textset_text (a_text: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- set the ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_texttext of the frame local a_cs: ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING do ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_internal_textinternal_text := a_text.Falseas_string_32.Falsetwin a_cs := create {attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string (a_text) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_frame_set_labelgtk_frame_set_label (../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_container_widgetcontainer_widget, a_cs.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_itemitem) end
f_set_border_width../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_set_border_widthset_border_width (value: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Make value the new border width of Current. do ../implementation_interface/ev_frame_i.xml#f_border_widthborder_width := value {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_container_set_border_widthgtk_container_set_border_width (../implementation_gtk/ev_container_imp.xml#f_container_widgetcontainer_widget, value) end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_internal_text../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_internal_textinternal_text: detachable FalseSTRING_32 -- Text used to represent frame's label text
f_internal_alignment_code../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_internal_alignment_codeinternal_alignment_code: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Code used to represent label alignment
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_frame.xmlEV_FRAME note option: stable attribute end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2017, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_frame_imp.xmlEV_FRAME_IMP
